title: Tambo Ilusion
description: A private conservation area located 10 minutes outside of Tarapoto center where tourists are welcome to walk on a nature path in the jungle, practice yoga, learn about permaculure, apiculture, lumbriculture (all practiced onsite on a small scale), swim in a fresh water lagoon, and eat vegetarian food. Service is offered in Spanish, English, and French.
streetAddress: Carr. Laguna Venecia, Ultima cuadra, District Banda de Shilcayo
